description: Database connection failure causing complete application outage.
logs: ERROR: Database connection timed out.
CRITICAL: Application server unable to connect to database.
WARNING: Connection pool exhausted.
INFO: Database server restarting.
ERROR: SQLSTATE[08006] [7] could not connect to server: Connection refused.
ERROR: Application log - Database transaction failed.
CRITICAL: Application crashed due to database failure.
ERROR: Connection to database lost.
WARNING: Slow query detected.
ERROR: Database server is unreachable.
INFO: Database backup initiated.
ERROR: Database lock contention detected.
ERROR: Database schema mismatch.
CRITICAL: Application unable to start due to database error.
ERROR: Failed to execute SQL query.

description: Payment gateway integration failure, impacting all transactions.
logs: ERROR: Payment gateway API returned 500 Internal Server Error.
ERROR: Payment transaction failed.
WARNING: Invalid payment gateway response.
ERROR: Connection to payment gateway timed out.
CRITICAL: All payment transactions are failing.
ERROR: Payment gateway integration error.
ERROR: Invalid API key used for payment gateway.
WARNING: Payment gateway service is experiencing high latency.
ERROR: Payment gateway rejected transaction.
ERROR: Payment gateway API returned 400 Bad Request.
INFO: Payment gateway service restarted.
ERROR: Payment gateway server is unreachable.
CRITICAL: Payment processing is completely down.
ERROR: Currency conversion error during payment.
ERROR: Payment gateway signature verification failed.

description: Slow loading of product pages, affecting user experience.
logs: WARNING: Product page loading time exceeded 5 seconds.
INFO: Image assets loading slowly.
WARNING: Database query for product data is slow.
INFO: CDN latency detected.
WARNING: High CPU utilization on web server.
INFO: Network latency to database.
WARNING: Unoptimized image sizes.
INFO: Javascript files taking long to load.
WARNING: Large number of database connections.
INFO: Cache miss on product data.
WARNING: Slow API calls to product service.
INFO: High memory usage on application server.
WARNING: Inefficient CSS loading.
INFO: Database index missing.
WARNING: Slow rendering of product images.

description: Typo in a non-critical error message.
logs: INFO: Error message displayed with typo: 'incorret' instead of 'incorrect'.
DEBUG: UI component displaying incorrect error message.
INFO: Spelling error found in error message string.
DEBUG: String resource file contains typo.
INFO: Typo detected in client-side error message.
DEBUG: Error message key 'ERROR_MESSAGE_TYPO' has incorrect value.
INFO: Small UI text correction needed.
DEBUG: Localization file has spelling error.
INFO: Minor text fix required.
DEBUG: String comparison failed due to typo.
INFO: User interface displaying misspelled word.
DEBUG: Code review required for error message strings.
INFO: Non-critical user facing text error.
DEBUG: Text rendering issue.
INFO: Minor UI text mismatch.

description: User authentication failing for specific user group.

INFO: Firewall rules blocking authentication requests.
ERROR: Load balancer not routing authentication traffic correctly.
CRITICAL: User authentication system is down for specific group.
ERROR: API endpoint for authentication returned 500.
WARNING: Network switch configuration error.
ERROR: Application logic error in authentication module.
INFO: Logging server not receiving authentication logs.
ERROR: Invalid user group ID.
WARNING: Token validation failed.
ERROR: Database connection error during authentication.
CRITICAL: User authentication service is unavailable.
ERROR: User profile not found.
